name: Together We Stand (QuentinSauvage)
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Jam 2021.1, which theme was "Stronger Together".

Collect powerful characters scattered in each area of the level in order to defeat the boss, using every character's special abilities. 

Known Bugs:

Ennemies coming from spawners cant' be killed for the moment (ennemies spawned by event can be).

Credits:

UI assets: Controller Icon Pack and Simple Fantasy UI

Character Models: Little Heroes Mega Pack

Other models: Kenney, Polygon Knights Pack, Low Poly Ultimate Pack and Top Down - Fantasy Forest

Musics: Muz Station Productions
